Lists.desc: Fixed Fixed the issue where whatap-php.service registration and execution failed.
Lists.details:
• If the environment values are missing during a fresh installation, the agent may not be activated because it cannot recognize connection information (access key and server address).

    You can configure it manually using the following commands

    php command
    1. /usr/whatap/php/install.sh
    2. cp /usr/lib/systemd/system/whatap-php.service /etc/systemd/system/whatap-php.service

  • In existing installations, the update is applied correctly.

Lists.desc: Feature Reduced CPU load
Lists.details:
• Reduced CPU load by changing the criteria for monitoring targets.

  • Further reduced CPU load when user function monitoring is disabled.

    whatap.profile_method_enabled=false

Lists.desc: New CLI parameter URL display
Lists.details:
• Collects URLs including parameters when running CLI commands.

  • Example: php /home/www/test.php aaa bbb → Collected as /home/www/test.php aaa bbb

Lists.desc: New Collection of file parameter info
Lists.details: • Collects up to 20 parameters, each up to 256 bytes (partial data only).

Lists.desc: Fixed Memory leak fix
Lists.details: • Fixed memory leak caused by calling the error function when a DB function fails.

Lists.desc: New Added the option to stop collecting for each feature in PHP Extension.
Lists.details:
• whatap.ext.trace_enabled (default: true): Transaction information collection is disabled.

  • whatap.ext.profile_enabled (default: true): Basic transaction data collection is disabled.

  • whatap.ext.profile_sql_enabled (default: true): SQL profile collection is disabled.

  • whatap.ext.profile_httpc_enabled (default: true): HTTP calling profile collection is disabled.

  • whatap.ext.profile_socket_enabled (default: true): Socket-related profile collection is disabled.

Lists.desc: New Added the option to stop collection based on specific URIs.
Lists.details:
• whatap.ext.ignore_uris: Register URIs for which transaction data is not to be collected (separated by comma).

    • e.g. whatap.ext.ignore_uris=/aaa/bbb.php, /ccc/ddd.php

  • whatap.ext.ignore_profile_uris: Register URIs that collect basic transaction data but not detailed profile data (separated by comma).

    • e.g. whatap.ext.ignore_profile_uris=/aaa/bbb.php, /ccc/ddd.php

Lists.desc: New Added the feature to collect additional transaction data.
Lists.details:
• peak-memory: It collects the peak memory data while running PHP.

  • elapsed-utime: It collects the user CPU usage.

  • elapsed-stime: It collects the system CPU usage.

  • external-func-count: Number of executions of user functions

  • prof-external-func-count: Number of user functions traced by WhaTap Monitoring

  • internal-func-count: Number of executions of the PHP internal functions

  • prof-internal-func-count: Number of internal functions traced by WhaTap Monitoring

Lists.desc: Fixed Fixed the issue where a wrong profile is retrieved when searching for a profile because the transaction ID is not uniquely issued in the arm64 (aarch64) environment.
Fixed Fixed the issue where unnecessary data is collected and CPU load is generated despite the setting of the Stop System Resource Collection option.
Fixed Fixed the bug where only the hash (number) value appears, not the name, after setting the whatap.onode option.
Fixed Fix the bug where the whatap-php.service file is not recognized in Ubuntu 14.
New Added the option to prioritize environment variables over the agent configuration file (whatap.ini).
Lists.details:
• Agent settings are applied in the order of whatap.ini and then environment variables.

  • When the whatap.use_env_first option (default value: false) is set, environment variables take precedence over the settings in the whatap.ini file.

    whatap.ini
    whatap.use_env_first=true

  • Alternatively, you can set the environment variable as WHATAP_USE_ENV_FIRST=true.

Lists.desc: Fixed Fixed the recognition error for the OKIND environment variable.
Lists.details: You can set okind by using the OKIND or WHATAP_OKIND environment variable.

Lists.desc: New PHP 8.3 has been supported.
Feature Trace context (W3C) is supported in the multi-transaction tracing.
Lists.details: OpenTelmetry that supports the trace context, and the multi-transaction tracing correlation are supported.

Lists.desc: Changed Modified the resource collection for SQL, Method, and HTTP call.
Lists.details: The differences between resources (CPU, memory) at the start of the transaction and the start of each step are collected.

Lists.desc: Changed Modified to newly create the configuration file (whatap.conf) if nothing.
Fixed Fixed the error where the cumulative number of outbound calls are collected wrong as the cumulative time in the active transation list.
Fixed Fixed the whatap-php service (whatap-php.service) execution error in the Linux environment.
Fixed Fixed the segmentation errors from PHP 8.1.0 to 8.1.2 (collection for user functions is stopped).
New Supported linux aarch64.
Changed Used the security.conf file instead of paramkey.txt
Lists.details: It uses the value of the paramkey key in the previous security.conf file. The default value has been changed to WHATAP instead of a random value. If "WHATAP" is specified, decryption is enabled without entering a key.

Lists.desc: Changed Changed the normalization option setting for SQL statements.
Lists.details:
• Always enable normalization by separating parameters in SQL statements. Always set the whatap.trace_sql_normalize_enabled option to true.

  • If you have already disabled the normalization option (disable normalization), activate the setting to normalize and display parameters separately.

    • Set the whatap.profile_sql_param_enabled option to true.
    • Normalized parameters are separately encrypted and collected.
    • You can check the data by decrypting it with paramkey in security.conf.

Lists.desc: New Added the agent configuration options to collect transaction statistics by IP address.
Feature Added the agent configuration option for setting the statistics compression transmission.
New PHP 8.4 지원
Fixed session_start 프로파일 정보의 위치 수정
Lists.details: session_start 함수 내부에서 Redis 쿼리가 실행될 때, session_start 함수 정보를 Redis 쿼리 보다 먼저 표시하도록 수정합니다.

Lists.desc: Fixed 멀티 트랜잭션 샘플링 수정
Lists.details: 멀티 트랜잭션 샘플링이 비활성화되면, 외부 HTTP 호출이 여러 개여도 분산 트랜잭션 추적을 중단합니다.

Lists.desc: Changed Modified to use variables in date format for naming the log monitoring files.
Lists.details: Modified based on the use of Python strftime(). e.g. 20240101: %Y%m%d

Lists.desc: Changed Modified the guide message of the installation script (/usr/whatap/php/install.sh).
